en_text: Is right here with me
jp_text: 確かにここにある
google_translated: Certainly here

en_text: To have overflowing feelings
jp_text: 教えてくれたから
google_translated: Because I taught me

en_text: Even if this world were to end
jp_text: この世界がなくなっても
google_translated: Even if this world is gone

en_text: I'll be right by your side
jp_text: 私はそこにいる
google_translated: I am there

en_text: I swear that I will bring you Saber's head.
jp_text: あのセイバーの首はお約束いたします
google_translated: That Saber's neck promises

en_text: They can enjoy the magical atelier of Kayneth El-Melloi.
jp_text: ケイネス·エルメロイの魔術工房を堪能してもらおうではないか
google_translated: Don't you enjoy the Magician studio of Keine Snow

en_text: Night of Stratagems
jp_text: お迎えに上がりました 聖処女よ
google_translated: A saint-service that came up to pick you up
